text: (Hontōni) shinkō surunaraba, arrā no kyōkun ni, mata, keiji sa reta shinri ni, kokoro o munashiku shite junpō suru toki ga mada yattekonai no ka. Izen ni keiten o 授 Tte inagara,(kan'yō no toki ga) nobasa rete, kokoro ga ganko ni natta mono no yōdeatte wa naranai node wanai ka. Kare-ra no ōku wa arrā no okite ni somuku-sha-tachidearu
